You won't see it get carried away by a few good games or some lucky momentum. It's emotionless and objective. We'll update the NBA Power Rankings every week. - - - ## **Week 2 NBA Power Rankings** ![NBA Power Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-power-rankings-week-2-bet-refinery.png "NBA Power Rankings for week 2") What does the Rating mean? The LA Lakers at 7.13 means the Lakers are 7.13 points better than average. Cleveland -6.40 means 6.40 worse than average. The number doesn't include home ground advantage either. So Lakers vs Cavs at Staples is going to create a monster line on our **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings - Big Improvers** As you can see, the Model underestimated the Brooklyn Nets. Kyrie + KD are on the move and you can see them climbing higher again. However, the Model doesn't have them atop the East. It still prefer the Bucks and Raps. Other big movers include: * Chris Paul's Suns * The 4-2 Utah Jazz * The High Scoring Hawks * Thib's Knicks Dallas and New Orleans are quietly putting in work too. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings - Tokyo Drifters** Some betting vernacular for you. When something drifts, it becomes less favourable in the market. The odds drift out. It's 'friendless in betting'. So the Tokyo Drifters on our NBA Power Rankings are the teams on the slide. For Week 2 that is: * The Celtics * Thunder * Heat Chicago are on the slide as well. Wonder if the Cavs will maintain the same spot next week when they have notched some suprising victories to this point in the season. - - - #### **Want more insight?
